METHOD.description: 加密算法，支持：aes-128-cfb, aes-192-cfb, aes-256-cfb,cast5-cfb, des-cfb, rc4-md5-6, rc4, table.推荐使用 AEAD 加密方式：xchacha20-ietf-poly1305, chacha20-ietf-poly1305, aes-256-gcm, aes-192-gcm, aes-128-gcm，不推荐：aes-128-ctr, aes-192-ctr, aes-256-ctr, aes-128-cfb, aes-192-cfb, aes-256-cfb, camellia-128-cfb, camellia-192-cfb, camellia-256-cfb, chacha20-ietf. 勿用：bf-cfb,chacha20,salsa20,rc4-md5

PORT.description: 设置监听端口，该地址是客户端需要连接的端口
